name: Found Guys (SquidMaker)
description:
Found guys is a game where the player needs to search and find items in a variety of bright colourful levels. The players are cautiously under an amount of time to find each of the correct objects which then gives you extra time within the game. As well as single player mode, work together or sabotage your friends in the 2 player mode.

In this definitive version of Found Guys. We have made 5 new levels, added hats and added 3 other languages.  With of course many new improvements to the game experience. 

We hope you enjoy Found Guys!

This game was originally made for Global Game Jam 2021 and then expanded for Games Innovation Challenge hosted by NSE and Barclays .

Found Guys VS came in 3rd place for Games Innovation Challenge! 

At the start of June, we where accepted to be on Tranfuzer's 2021 Enterprise Pathway to work further on Found Guys. From June to August the team has been working on the game to make the best prototype we can. 

Controls:

Player 1:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Hold and Throw - Enter

Escape - Pause

Player 2:

Move - Left, Right, Up, Down Keys

Jump - 8 Numpad

Hold and Throw - 7 Numpad

Switch Languages - 1 and 2
